domain

Class Hospital

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.Property
      • domain.Hospital
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Hospital
extends domain.Property
    Version:
    6.25. Concrete class of abstract Property. We validate all attributes of the property and will throw an exception if any invalid input is given. Industrial Waste Management and Fire Services Levy are charged together with CIV value multiplied by a CIV rate.
    Author:
    Zac, Anush
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hospital

        public Hospital(java.lang.String description,
                java.lang.String location,
                double area,
                double siteValue,
                double capitalImprovedValue,
                double capitalImprovedRate,
                double netAnnualValue,
                java.lang.String valuationDate,
                domain.RatePayer owner,
                java.lang.String isPublic,
                java.lang.String facilities,
                int numberOfFloors)
         throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Construct a new Hospital which takes in all attributes of a property and a hospital. Instantiate the Property class with its nine-parameter constructor by passing in the Property class attributes. Set the Hospital class attributes based on the values passed in from the parameters. It will throw an exception if any attribute passed in is null or invalid.
        Parameters:
        description - A string to define the description of property
        location - A string to define the location of property
        area - A double to specify the area of property in square metres
        siteValue - A double to specify the site value of property
        capitalImprovedValue - A double to specify the Capital Improved Value of property, it should be greater than the site value
        capitalImprovedRate - A double to specify the Capital Improved Rate of property
        netAnnualValue - A double to specify the net annual value of property
        valuationDate - A string to define the valuation date of property
        owner - A RatePayer object to specify the owner of property
        isPublic - A boolean value to specify the public/private status of Hospital
        facilities - A string to define the facilities of Hospital
        numberOfFloors - An integer to specify the number of floors of Hospital
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameter passed in is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter passed in invalid

      • Hospital

        public Hospital()
        Construct a new Hospital with zero parameter. Instantiate the Property class with its zero-parameter constructor. Assign default values for Hospital class attributes. Set the Capital Improved Rate on the Property class for this property type.

      • setUpExtraServices

        public void setUpExtraServices()
        Overriden method to setup the extra services on the Hospital property. For Hospital property, Industrial Waste Disposal and Fire Services Levy fees are added.
        Specified by:
        setUpExtraServices in class domain.Property

      • calculateExtraServices

        public double calculateExtraServices()
        Overriden method to calculate the extra services fees by adding them altogether.
        Specified by:
        calculateExtraServices in class domain.Property
        Returns:
        the extra services fees of this property

      • getExtraServicesDetails

        public java.lang.String getExtraServicesDetails()
        Specified by:
        getExtraServicesDetails in class domain.Property
        Returns:
        a string representing the toString() of the extra services for Industrial Waste Disposal and Fire Services Levy if extra services are already set up

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class domain.Property
        Returns:
